name: Grave Wisp
text_description: The tiny Grave Wisp is born from the powerful emotions imbued in ancient tombs. When Grave Wisp is in play, it can absorb an attack intended for another Spirit type card once per turn.
illustration_description: A small, ghost-like figure hovers over an old, moss-covered tombstone. The wisp itself is translucent and radiates a soft, green glow, depicting sorrow and longing. The setting is an eerie moonlit graveyard with fog hovering over the ground.
